row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) > 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 8)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
row_desc: Queen has at least one mini challenge win.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
